title: *1150 N American St *2 beds 1 bath apt. in Philadelphia
description:
A modern and luxurious apartment at a great price in a superb location. This unit is ideal for folks who are looking to live in one of Philadelphia's best neighborhoods. Hardwood flooring, large windows, and high ceilings are just a few of the magnificent features this apartment offers. Each bedroom is large enough to accommodate a full-size bed and can be furnished upon request. The eat-in kitchen features brand-new stainless appliances, a wall-mounted TV, and beautiful countertops. This pet-friendly apartment comes equipped with central heating and air conditioning, high-speed WiFi, and smart locks.
Known today as a thriving community of artists, designers, college students, and young adults, you would most likely never guess this was once a major industrial area of Philadelphia. Revisioned in the 1990s, Northern Liberties has become a hipster hotbed located approximately two miles outside of Center City. Popular due to its proximity, it is currently one of the city's most desirable places to live. "NoLibs" is a walkable, bike-friendly neighborhood served by SEPTA's Market-Frankford Line. Flush with craft breweries, gastropubs, cafes, and an assortment of various cuisines, this neighborhood is sure to please. Situated just off the main commercial thoroughfare in Northern Liberties, this sixth-floor apartment is a walker's paradise. If you are planning to commute into Center City, this is the perfect place for you. A 10-minute walk will get you to Girard Station

The apartment features two bedrooms and one full bathroom with high ceilings. There is beautiful new solid hardwood oak flooring throughout. The unit features a central air heat system. For your convenience, there is a laundry room in the basement with a washer/dryer on site. Lastly, there is a beautiful large enclosed backyard that makes outdoor entertaining fantastic. This space would also be great for pets. Public transportation is easily accessible and just one block away from the Susquehanna-Dauphin Station on the Broad Street Line. Come to see this!!!

title: Cozy 1-Bedroom Apartment near Philadelphia Museum of Art
description:
1 Bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor of the building.

- Close to Philadelphia Art Museum, Rodin Museum, and many other museums.
- Nearby Grocery Stores include Whole Foods and Target.
- Wawa less than a block away.
- Coin operated washer/dryer in the basement.
- Public transportation nearby as well as easy entrance and exit off I-676 nearby.

- The apartment has central heating/cooling.
- Kitchen has floor tiles while the rest of the apartment have hardwood floors.
- Living room space and kitchen are separated by a wall.
- Bathroom is connected to bedroom.
- Tenant pays for electricity and gas.
Requirements:
Minimum credit score: 650
If you have a pet, additional $500 pet deposit required
Apartment will be available on June 1st. Email if interested in viewing the apartment. Masks are required during the tour.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: Get the breathing room you crave in this spacious bilevel condo
description: Get the breathing room you crave in this spacious bilevel condo with amazing outdoor space. Located on sweet little Montrose St, this stylish home has storage galore, hardwood floors throughout, a recently updated kitchen and bathroom and a downright huge bedroom. Entering from the shared vestibule, there's a wide chevron marble-tiled landing with a deep coat closet and spiral stairs to take you down to the main living area (and the removable railings make furniture move-in a breeze). The great natural light and high ceilings with recessed lighting make it hard to believe you're below grade--and you'll just love the sweet built-in bench seat tucked behind the stairs. There's room for a dining table or a home office setup adjacent to the U-shaped kitchen with charcoal gray Shaker-style cabinets, white subway tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances including French door fridge, and granite countertops with breakfast bar. There's a discreet laundry closet on this floor as well. Back upstairs off the bright and airy hallway is the recently renovated bathroom, which features pretty porcelain tile floors, marble-topped vanity and an extra-wide walk-in shower with frameless glass door, white subway tile surround and marble hex tile floor. That downright-huge bedroom has great closet space, a nook perfect for a dresser, and two exposures of natural light. Through the bedroom is access to the lovely private backyard, where the dream of outdoor living is realized--there's plenty of room for gardening, grilling and chilling. Perfectly situated to enjoy the best of not just Queen Village but also Bella Vista and the Italian Market, this sweet condo has all the charm of a QV trinity with a much more favorable floorplan.

Located on a small quiet, tree lined street, this property is just a short walk to Rittenhouse Square, Fitler Square, UPENN, CHOP and HUP. Enter the property through a gated brick hallway which provides access to the side entrance and backyard. Lovely original hardwood floors are found throughout, updated kitchen, living room with decorative fireplace and flat screen TV. The second floor features a nice sized bedroom with fabulous built-in closets, and a hall bath with radiant heated floors. The third floor features an additional bedroom with murphy bed, exposed brick, built-ins and sky light which provides plenty of sun light. The property includes a private back patio which is perfect for a morning cup of coffee or enjoying the weather. This property is truly a must see, tucked away on a cozy, quiet street, but conveniently located just one block from the Lombard Swim Club, City Fitness Gym and many other popular restaurants/cafes. Property can be rented fully furnished (minus the bed in the second floor bedroom and tenants personal possessions). No pets.
